ns0:DescribedValueSet.displayName: Education on Signs and Symptoms of Cancer Recurrence
ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: The focus is to assess that education on signs and symptoms of cancer recurrence is provided.),(Data Element Scope: This data element maps to the Intervention and Communication categories of the QDM.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes education regarding signs and symptoms of a disease process, specifically cancer education.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excluded are codes that do not meet inclusion criteria.)
ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Definition: (2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1047.340:Education on Signs and Symptoms of Cancer Recurrence)
